TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509WindowsSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken

summary.span: 表示以 X.509 憑證為基礎的安全性權杖，且該憑證會對應至 Windows 網域使用者或本機的電腦使用者帳戶。

span.span: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate and that the certificate is mapped to a Windows domain user or local computer user account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式開發者通常不需要使用 類別，除非 Web 服務必須取得傳入 SOAP 訊息或是憑證對應網域或電腦帳戶中所參考之 X.509 憑證的詳細資料。Typically, application developers do not need to use the class, unless a Web service must gain access to details about a X.509 certificate referenced in an incoming SOAP message or the domain or computer account that the certificate is mapped to. 如需取得 X.509 憑證的詳細資料，請存取 屬性。To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the property. 如需取得使用者身分識別，請參閱 屬性。To get the user identity, see the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證和 Windows 網域或電腦帳戶，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified X.509 certificate and Windows domain or computer account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會產生 安全性權杖的唯一識別碼，並且會將該值指派為 屬性。This constructor creates a unique identifier for the security token and assigns that value to the property.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫 方法。Call the method when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫 方法後，您必須釋放所有對 的參考，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收 所佔用的記憶體。After calling the method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 方法。Always call the method before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
